Title: Pure Nude Yoga- Ocean Goddess - Beginning & Intermediate Yoga

reviewText: This is the third episode in the "Pure Nude Yoga" series. I haven't seen the other two, so I couldn't tell you how it compares.Pure Nude Yoga - Zen Garden Goddess,Pure Nude Yoga - Worship the SunVersus other nude yoga titles out there, however - this one is a little more stimulating - and the camera lingers upon the woman's nude form a little bit more.  This yogini is also a tad more buxom than your typical nude yoga practitioner.  And the camera seems to focus on parts of her longer.  Or maybe that's just my own personal bias showing through.The setting is a beautifully rocky section of coastline, shot in late afternoon or evening.  The water is a deep blue, and the sky is more pale.  And the director turns the girl in shadow whenever he doesn't want us to see.  She also has a little tuft that shields our prying eyes from her most delicate regions.  The raw beauty of both the coastline - and her natural figure - are unmistakable.She maintains each pose for what seems like minutes.  The camera pans satisfyingly up and down her frame.  Its fun to watch how gravity takes its course. But the overall feeling is more serene and sensual than erotic.  The name of the pose is shown on-screen each time she changes position.  Relative to other nude yoga videos which don't do this,I found this information to be quite helpful.She assumes relationships while standing up, and laying down - and on all-fours both prone and supine.  One of my favorite postures is when she lays on her tummy and props herself up on her elbows like a sphinx, which gives us a more enchanting way to admire her.  She finishes where she began, in the lotus position reaching towards the sky and then lowering her hands in front of her as if to pray.This movie is much slower paced and much more relaxing to watch than other similar nude yoga presentations.  The run time is just over an hour.  Other like films are but a fraction of this.As another nice feature, the movie repeats itself automatically, which makes it more convenient to watch while in the background.  I usually just leave it on - as I'm working out, cleaning or preparing dinner.If you're looking for a colorful and scenic nude yoga video that lingers on each pose longer, and where the woman is just a bit more endowed, then "Pure Nude Yoga - Ocean Goddess" may be the perfect release for you.  Enjoy.
Title: Pure Nude Yoga- Ocean Goddess - Beginning & Intermediate Yoga

reviewText: This is a very relaxing and sensual workout.  It's a great one to do in the privacy of your own home.  I love to be able to do it  in the buff...it feels really good.
Title: Pure Nude Yoga- Ocean Goddess - Beginning & Intermediate Yoga

reviewText: I am revising my first review because today when I watched this video for the third time I realized I was too negative in my first review with it. I apologize for that.There is nudity in this video but there is also a lot of shadow and silhouette. That was my original complaint. I guess I just expected (or wanted) more, but at any rate, I was overly harsh with my comments.Much of it is shot into the sun so the model is in her own shadow, but sometimes the camera angle changes so that she catches the sun and is quite visible. I still wonder why they have so many shots of the ocean waves unless it's just a way to fill in time so the video is long enough to call it an hour. (It's 58 minutes.)As far a the yoga goes, the model appears to do a very good job of performing the asanas. She is all natural.  The music is quiet and relaxing. You really can't practice along with the model because there is no verbal cueing. However if you already know yoga and have your own set of poses you could use this video for some inspiration.There is no menu, no angle options, and no audio options even though it says on the box there is. It does restart itself when it's over so it will run in a continuous loop.
Title: Pure Nude Yoga- Ocean Goddess - Beginning & Intermediate Yoga

reviewText: Mira, the yogini that performs on this DVD does very well.  The asana practice is very good and when performed at the pace she presents it with awareness and effort to improve or even perfect the asanas it can a challenge the student yogi.  She is a very beautiful young woman and certainly as she continues her practice she will continue to grow and improve.  The location is beautiful, the video production is comparable to that presented in "Zen Garden Goddess."  The only fault I wish to express is that is the available sound track options of choice between natures sounds and nature sounds with music doesn't work; on this DVD I cannot access natural sounds only.
Title: Pure Nude Yoga- Ocean Goddess - Beginning & Intermediate Yoga

reviewText: very well done beautiful women I like it a lot. beautiful scenery this was very sexy but awesome dvd well done.
Title: Pure Nude Yoga- Ocean Goddess - Beginning & Intermediate Yoga

reviewText: Obviously, you can guess that yoga is a discipline that requires stretching and bending and flexing muscles and bones in a coordinated method that relieves pain and not create it. However, watch someone exercise has it's limited moments and then boredom happens. This instructional video is done tastefully, but yes, done in the nude while showing placement of hands, legs, arms and torso in many patterned sets. If you are looking for something else, then look elsewhere. I practice and yes in the nude, but I also realize it's not for every lifestyle or interest. I gave it four stars, not because it lacked something, but more to why a pose is better for those who are young or older or who have physical challenges and why some poses are not meant for everyone.
Title: Pure Nude Yoga- Ocean Goddess - Beginning & Intermediate Yoga

reviewText: The model and the scenery are both very attractive, and in all honesty I really can't say what this video is missing but there is something lacking.  I would still recommend it as a rental but I'm not sure about buying  it.
Title: Pure Nude Yoga- Ocean Goddess - Beginning & Intermediate Yoga
